item.title: How do i make players in a Megascape server Mods/Admins
item.dc:creator: @bloodbath32 bloodbath32
item.description:
@bloodbath32 wrote:

Well once the player has made an acocunt the name of the character should be added in the Characters file of your source file. So open the file that has the name of the character on it…
and scroll down a bit and you should see rights = 0 . If i am correct. You can change their rights if you want. -1 = banned, 0 = normal player, 1 = player mod, 2 = admin, 3 = owner.

Read full topic
